keyword: how many calories in an egg mcmuffin
title: How Many Calories in an Egg McMuffin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in an egg mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, and sodium, plus tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in an Egg McMuffin?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Egg McMuffin: toasted English muffin, folded egg, Canadian bacon, American cheese; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data; check app or labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One Egg McMuffin provides about 310 kcal, 17 g protein, and 770 mg sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with fast-food labels.

tweaks.label: Sausage patty instead of Canadian bacon

faqs.q: How many calories are in a McDonald's Egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 310 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: About 17 g of protein per Egg McMuffin.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in an egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, around 30 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber from the muffin.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Roughly 770 mg, mostly from the bacon and cheese.

faqs.q: Does customizing an egg mcmuffin change calories?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”removing cheese saves ~50 kcal; adding sausage adds ~20 kcal.
